version_description:
- Fixed the bug causing a number of upgrades not to function
- Fixed the bug causing HP to increase upon Automatic Destruction
- Balance adjustment
- Bug fix
- Other small corrections and improvements

- The addition of auxiliary equipment
- Balance adjusted and difficulty level slightly lowered.
- Fixed a bug with rankings.
- Improvement in performance
- Rankings Reset
- Minor bug fix
- Other small revisions and improvements
